entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a witness who brought Mrs. Figg with him to the hearing.

entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is mentioned as a witch and the head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as the person who is questioning Mrs. Figg at the hearing.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is mentioned as a witness who goes to get Mrs. Figg from outside the door.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being present at the hearing and noticing Mrs. Figg's appearance.

entities.name: mrs. figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is mentioned as a witness who is brought to the hearing by Dumbledore.

entities.name: department of magical law enforcement (dmele)
entities.description: The Department of Magical Law Enforcement is mentioned as an organization that Madam Bones heads.

relationships.description: Fudge questions Mrs. Figg at the hearing.
Dumbledore brought Mrs. Figg to the hearing.
Percy Weasley went outside to get Mrs. Figg.
Dumbledore and Harry are present at the hearing together.
